amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Health Education Assistance Loan Program; bonds or other obligations; how paid.
amendatorysection.para: Notwithstanding section 85-1738, all bonds, notes, or other obligations issued by the authority for the Nebraska Health Education Assistance Loan Program shall be payable out of the revenue generated in connection with loans funded under sections 85-1754 to 85-1759, or from reserves or other money available for such purpose as may be designated in the resolution of the authority under which the bonds, notes, or other obligations are issued or as may be designated in a trust indenture authorized by the authority.
